text:
Zoosk Inc. | San Francisco, CA | Full-time | On-site

Zoosk is a leading online dating company that personalizes the dating experience to help singles find the person and relationship that’s just right for them. Zoosk’s Behavioural Matchmaking technology is constantly learning from the actions of over 35 million members in order to deliver better matches in real time. With the #1 grossing online dating app in the Apple App Store, Zoosk is a market leader in mobile dating.

Check out our engineering blog at: https://about.zoosk.com/en/engineering-blog/

Roles:

-- Sr. Software Engineer, JavaScript

-- Sr. Software Engineer, Server-Side & Cloud Application

-- Software Development Engineer in Test

All positions offer a competitive salary, equity, and comprehensive benefits. Learn more at https://www.zoosk.com/careers/

Interested in a role? Email laurag@zoosk.com
